name: Pico 8 G.T.T.A. test
description:
The concept behind this game was try to make it adapt over time however this was a little too much for us to do within our time constraints as this was our first time working with the Pico 8. Today we have here is the basics mechanics of what we wanted to accomplish as well as a small narrative concept of asteroids falling to earth as you defend it.

How to play the game.

Use the arrow keys to move around and use your ship to bounce asteroids to earn points. No end game currently.
